thread.section_title: Palazzo Navona Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A Little Gem
thread.title_full: A Little Gem - Review of Palazzo Navona Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: jim-from-swindon
title: A Little Gem
text:
On arrival was greeted by reception staff who where most helpful and friendly [always had a smile, not like some hotels].
We arrived early morning but was lucky enough to be given our room straight away.
The room was immaculately clean and modern design, [very comfy beds].
The hotel was also immaculately clean throughout.
Nice little bar for night cap, Continental Breakfast, superb with a lot to choose from.
The location of this hotel is brilliant for all the sight seeing, you can walk to all attractions within 5 minutes.
This was my first time in Rome, loved the city, all the attractions and restaurants.
I recommend this hotel. 10/10
